version_description:
- Added multi team support
- Added new character (Ganyu)
- Added resonances & reactions descriptions
- Added where to obtain materials information
- Bug fixing

- Added in-app purchase to to remove Ads.
- Added new banner characters and weapons.
- Bug fixing.

- Added new Tier List page.
- Fixed issue with interstitial loading.
- UI/UX improvements.
- Bug fixes.

- New Hu Tao character.
- Bug fixes.

- Added Artifacts to Builds & Agenda
- Added 1.4 weapons
- Updated Tier List
- Bug Fixing

- Added Eula
- Added Yangfei
- Added New Artifact Sets
- Added New Claymore
- Updated builds
- Bug fixing
